name: All Legs
description:
Made a tribute sorta for the  Congratulations Podcast, but mostly for Chris' pajama pants. Race Juan Fire, a Cuda, and an Elder spirit baby on your old high school's track, a place you wish you never had to come back to. Well, you're here now.

Press Space to run.

Feedback appreciated.

Podcast can be found at :https://www.congratulationspod.com/
